bibl.title: Two Receipts and a Loan of Money.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 25118. Tax Receipt. Arsinoe, 7th century. - 2. Inv. 21684. Receipt for payment issued by three men, all eirenarchs. Arsinoite, 6th-7th century. - 3. Inv. 25628. Loan of Money. Arsinoite (?), A.D. 591-592. - Pp. 46-54: Appendix. The Duties of Eirenarchs in the Late Roman and Byzantine Egypt. - The Names of Eirenarchs in Papyri in Alphabetical Order.
bibl.seg: SYRKOU Angeliki, Two Receipts and a Loan of Money.
ArchPF 49 (2003) pp. 43-56, 2 tabl. et pll. V [b]-VIII.

1. Inv. 25118. Tax Receipt. Arsinoe, 7th century. - 2. Inv. 21684. Receipt for payment issued by three men, all eirenarchs. Arsinoite, 6th-7th century. - 3. Inv. 25628. Loan of Money. Arsinoite (?), A.D. 591-592. - Pp. 46-54: Appendix. The Duties of Eirenarchs in the Late Roman and Byzantine Egypt. - The Names of Eirenarchs in Papyri in Alphabetical Order.
